NewsArticle.Title: Server Down Time - Resolved
NewsArticle.Content:
Hello,
As of 8:11 PM (PST) we believe that the issues with the ISP have been resolved for the most part, and the game should be working correctly now.
We will be adding 1 day to all the active accounts to compensate for this down time.
We are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.
DA Team
